mapper.select: SELECT B.TASK_SN, B.TASK_NM, B.TASK_CN, b.task_presentn_tmlmt, B.TASK_DE, b.atchmnfl_id FROM ESTBL_COURS A, TASK B, STDNT C, ATNLC_LCTRE D WHERE a.estbl_cours_cd = b.estbl_cours_cd AND a.estbl_cours_cd = d.estbl_cours_cd AND d.mber_no = c.mber_no AND c.mber_no = #{mberNo} AND a.estbl_cours_cd = #{estblCoursCd}
